alert.note: Alert for Iowa; Lafayette; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 15 at 10:01PM CST until December 15 at 10:45PM CST by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CST FOR LAFAYETTE...IOWA AND SAUK COUNTIES... At 958 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Wisconsin Rapids to 7 miles east of Wonewoc to Benton, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Recent report of 68 mph gust in Platteville. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Baraboo, Reedsburg, Dodgeville, Prairie Du Sac, Sauk City, Wisconsin Dells, Mineral Point, Darlington, Lake Delton, Spring Green, West Baraboo, Shullsburg, Belmont, Benton, Argyle, Blanchardville, Barneveld, Wiota, Arena and Plain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for south central Wisconsin. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, if one is spotted act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure, such as a basement or small interior room.
